name.ja: マグナム・ザ・リリーバー

text.en:
1 monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck + 1 monster in the hand
You can target 1 "Polymerization" Spell or "Fusion " Spell in your GY; place it on the bottom of the Deck, then draw 1 card. When another card or effect is activated (Quick Effect): You can banish 1 "Polymerization" Spell or "Fusion" Spell from your GY, then target 1 card on the field; destroy it. You can only use each effect of "Magnum the Reliever" once per turn.

materials: 1 monster Special Summoned from the Extra Deck + 1 monster in the hand
